name: Apple
long_description: Apples are one of the most popular fruits around the world. They come in various colors and flavors, offering a range of health benefits. From aiding digestion to promoting heart health, apples are a versatile and tasty addition to any diet.

name: Strawberry
long_description: Strawberries are vibrant red berries known for their sweet and slightly tart flavor. They are rich in vitamin C, fiber, and antioxidants. Strawberries can be enjoyed fresh, added to salads, used in desserts, or blended into delicious smoothies.

name: Tomato
short_desc: Juicy and flavorful fruit (commonly used as a vegetable)
long_desc: Tomatoes are botanically classified as fruits but are commonly used as vegetables in cooking. They are known for their juicy texture and sweet-tart flavor. Tomatoes are used in salads, sauces, soups, and various other dishes.

name: Carrot
long_desc: Carrots are root vegetables that are known for their bright orange color and sweet, crunchy texture. They are rich in beta-carotene, which is converted into vitamin A in the body. Carrots can be eaten raw, cooked, or juiced.
